arStrings.szText: You gain {c_number}{SF_16}{/c} Vigor per second for every Nearby enemy Poisoned by {c_important}Withering Fist{/c}, up to {c_number}{SF_17}{/c} .
Enemies Poisoned by {c_important}Withering Fist{/c} deal {c_number}[{SF_18}*100|%|]{/c} less damage.

{c_important}Withering Fist's{/c} {c_number}3rd{/c} attack spreads its Poisoning to {c_number}{SF_20}{/c} Nearby unaffected enemies. Hitting a {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} enemy will also spread that effect to all hit.
